review:
CAD/CAM Lingual Orthodontic treatment is the latest and best technology and has indeed helped me gain valuable aesthetics as it involves sophisticated 3D CAD (robot controlled Computer Aided Designing) software and customized brackets placed on the lingual (tongue) side of my teeth unlike labial braces (seen outside of teeth). Lingual CAD/CAM braces has been helping me in the following ways:

1) Best aesthetics in orthodontic treatment as the braces are completely invisible.
2) Easy recognition of ongoing teeth treatment by me (amateur and not only just orthodontists) as the braces is totally on the lingual side.
3) I did not undergo any soreness/ulcer inside my lips unlike with the use of conventional braces. (I only experienced minor ulcer at the back of my tongue, which was immediately taken care by Dr Ameet Kini as he provided the necessary ointment and medication)
4) Slurry speech (due to braces) was corrected within 4-5 days automatically.
5) Customized brackets and robot wiring is helping in the teeth movement better than the conventional braces (because of the sophisticated technology used) without compromising on the time lapse as it remains same as conventional braces.
6) I have been undergoing 4 months of treatment now and a big shout out to Dr Ameet Kini as the results also have been going in the same direction as the results of any other conventional braces.

But extreme careful maintenance is required as it involves customized brackets for each individual and it requires time to repair/replace in case the bracket is fallen off/broken.

Dr Ameet Kini has been extremely professional and friendly, has been helping me out with the smooth treatment and answering all my queries regarding diet, maintenance of oral hygiene and the appliance. The clinic is very hygienic and well maintained. I was very nervous about teeth extraction and the appliance. Dr Ameet Kini took care of it in an extremely smooth way and I did not experience any pain at all (and I finally overcame  the fear of "The Dentist") He follows standard procedure and I look forward to every orthodontic appointment. He always follows up on me with immediate responses in case of emergency or even on minute and mundane details.

Overall my ratings are as follows:

1) Dr Ameet Kini - 10/10 
2) CAD/CAM lingual braces - 10/10 (sophisticated aesthetic braces)
3) Power Smiles dental clinic and hygiene - 10/10
4) Explanation of appliance and doctor friendliness- 10/10
5) Treatment satisfaction - 10/10
6) Value for money - 8.8/10

I would definitely recommend Dr Ameet Kini and Power Smiles Dental Clinic for CAD/CAM lingual orthodontic treatment!

review:
My son is receiving teeth alignment treatment using metal braces from Dr. Ameet Kini.

Before visiting Dr. Ameet Kini’s Power Smiles Dental Speciality clinic, we had consulted two other dentists and both the dentists explained that for my son, one permanent tooth extraction will be required to make space for teeth alignment.

But when we met Dr. Ameet Kini, he explained that for teeth alignment, permanent teeth extraction should be avoided as far as possible as teeth removal can cause health issues later on and that in my son's case teeth extraction is not required.

We knew that we had come to the right place and decided to start the treatment with Dr. Ameet Kini. He is friendly and approachable and explained the treatment procedure in detail. After 9 months of braces, the teeth are already aligned properly and look good. The steady progress is completely worth it and no permanent teeth were removed. We are happy with the results. 
I highly recommend Dr. Ameet Kini for braces treatment.

The clinic is clean and hygienic and the staff is polite.
